name: Escape The Night
description:
First person puzzle adventure game which puts you in the shoes of a Runner tasked with trapping shadow monsters using a set of ever more complex puzzle ruins

Made by

Joaquín Rossi - Producer, Puzzle Designer , 
Emeline Jouvencel - Sound
Magu - Programming
Niklas Alenius - 3D Art, Shaders
Prabhav Bhatnagar - Programmer
Adam Streicher - VFX Artist, Lightning
